backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining groomers and services with CRUD-style methods and sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain text mapping frontend file paths to short human-written summaries.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the scheduler page and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/scheduler/Groome: UI component showing groomer cards with loading, error, and selection states.
frontend/src/components/scheduler/Servic: UI component showing services for a selected groomer with price formatting and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useGroomers.ts: React Query hook fetching all groomers from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useGroomerServices.ts: React Query hook fetching services for a given groomer ID from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication context and hooks managing login, identity loading, and state.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light/dark theming with base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
Implements the groomer selection and service listing flow with loading, error handling, and UI layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme variables, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and pending feature requests for the grooming scheduler.
